      retrofit2.Call<RenewTokenPojo> getAccessTokenApiBySSO(android.content.Context context, retrofit2.Callback<RenewTokenPojo> listener)
      After getting the callBackUrl next step is to get the AccessToken, RefreshToken, Filters, Permissions and other information(Which will be used in future) Hit SSO with Client Id, client_secrete and Redirect Code

      Once the Session is expired this method will call the SSO again and it will get all the required information again and it will store locally for future usage.

      • callUserAuthenticationApi

        public retrofit2.Call<LoginParentPojo> callUserAuthenticationApi(android.content.Context context,
                                                                 java.lang.String email,
                                                                 java.lang.String password,
                                                                 retrofit2.Callback<LoginParentPojo> listener)
        Login user using Email and Password which return UserInfo and it will start the Session. Call SSO(endpoint:login/) with email and password and get authenticated. After Authentication get the Session ID.
        Parameters:
        context -
        email - User Mail Id
        password - User Password
        listener -
        Returns:
        Response from SSO

      • getAccessTokenApiOnRenew

        public retrofit2.Call<RenewTokenPojo> getAccessTokenApiOnRenew(android.content.Context context,
                                                               retrofit2.Callback<RenewTokenPojo> listener)
        Once the Session is expired this method will call the SSO again and it will get all the required information again and it will store locally for future usage. It will get the new AccessToken and RenewToken
        Parameters:
        context -
        listener -
        Returns:

        @Deprecated
public retrofit2.Call<AccessTokenParentPojo> getAccessTokenApi(android.content.Context context,
                                                                            retrofit2.Callback<AccessTokenParentPojo> listener)
        Deprecated. use getAccessTokenApiBySSO(Context, Callback) instead
        * After getting the callBackUrl next step is to get the AccessToken, RefreshToken, Filters, Permissions and other information(Which will be used in future) Hit Product backend with the Redirect Code.
        Parameters:
        context -
        listener -
        Returns:
